title: What Does the 💕 Double Heart Emoji Mean?

steps.title: Love is in the air.
steps.content: Love is in the air. A 💕 can be used to show affection, especially if someone’s just started a relationship. Someone may add this emoji to the end of a message if they feel their love is reciprocated. [1] X Research source “Can’t believe it’s only been 2 months💕” “You know I’m always here for you💕”

steps.title: Your Super BFFs on Snapchat.
steps.content: Your Super BFFs on Snapchat. On this social media platform, a 💕 next to a friend’s name means you’ve been Best Friends for at least two months. You Snap with this friend the most, and the double heart emoji symbolizes your strong friendship. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Encouragement and support.
steps.content: Encouragement and support. Good vibes are spread with the 💕 because of the warm and loving feeling it evokes. You may see this emoji at the end of a sweet, feel-good message. [3] X Research source “You’re going to do great today💕” “I believe in you!💕”

steps.title: A sarcastic love for something hated.
steps.content: A sarcastic love for something hated. Someone may use a 💕 in a silly way when talking about something they don’t necessarily love. A double heart can show anything but affection when paired with other emojis. “Who doesn’t love emptying the dishwasher?💕🍽️🤣” “I just love Mondays💕🙃”

steps.title: To say you love someone.
steps.content: To say you love someone. Tell your partner, friend, or relative just how much you care for them with a 💕. This also shows that you know they love you too. “Missing you today💕” “I can’t stop thinking about you💕”

steps.title: To show your appreciation.
steps.content: To show your appreciation. Send a 💕 to a friend to say you’re grateful for them. A double heart emoji is also great to send your crush because it doesn’t have as much oomph or commitment as a ❤️. “Thank you, friend💕” “I really liked talking to you today💕😉”

steps.title: To be sarcastic
steps.content: To be sarcastic . Add a 💕 to the end of a complaint with a slew of other emojis to show your disdain. Whether it’s a task, chore, or obligation, this is a great way to show a little bit of annoyance. “I really love waking up at 6 am💕😴😫” “Homework is just the best💕😅☠️”

steps.title: To send good vibes.
steps.content: To send good vibes. Show someone you love support with the 💕. Add this emoji at the end of an encouraging message to make them smile and feel good. “Good morning! You’re going to ace that test! I just know it💕😊” “Keep your chin up! You got this💕👍🏻”

steps.title: The 💕 is one of many heart emojis you can use.
steps.content: The 💕 is one of many heart emojis you can use. To show even more love, you can use many heart emojis together!
